Source.Name: wiiuse
Source.Summary: WiiUse "feature complete" cross-platform Wii Remote access library
Source.Description: Wiiuse is a library written in C that connects with several Nintendo Wii remotes. Supports motion sensing, IR tracking, nunchuk, classic controller, Balance Board, and the Guitar Hero 3 controller. Single threaded and nonblocking makes a light weight and clean API.
